attributes.action: Allow Ann Summers to sell sex toys to anyone over 16.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At 16, you can legally have sex in the UK, but to buy a sex toy, or more sexier lingerie you have to be 18. 
We want the age lowered to buy these things to be 16, but also more education about sex toys, so people have more knowledge about sex toys, so they are used safely, so it becomes more pleasureable and not cringey.

We understand that some people may have concerns about this petition, but we are not forcing anyone to buy a sex toy, we just want to be able to buy a sex toy, if we, under 18s, want too.

rejection.details: We suggest that you re-word your petition to apply to sex toys and related products generally, rather than a specific chain of shops that sells them as this can be seen as advertisement of this company and also means you are requesting a change in the law for only one company, which the Government would not do.
reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
